Name: Periclase MgO
Type: Mineral
Class: Oxides
Subclass: 
Particle Size: 0-45um
Sample No.: O-14A
Owner: JPL
Wavelength Range: VNIR-SWIR
Origin: 
Collected by JPL
Description:  Synthetic periclase. 





Measurement: Hemispherical reflectance
First Column: X
Second Column: Y
X Units:  Wavelength (micrometers)
Y Units:  Reflectance (percent)
First X Value:   0.40
Last X Value:   2.50
Number of X Values:  826
Additional Information: o14aa.txt
